name: Acme Synthetic Chemicals - Linoleic Acid 99%
description: Acme Synthetic Chemicals is a specialty chemicals supplier offering ultra-high purity Linoleic Acid (99% minimum by gas chromatography). This essential omega-6 fatty acid is critical for skin barrier function, providing anti-inflammatory and moisturizing benefits in barrier repair formulations at affordable pricing.
notes: Indian specialty chemicals supplier offering ultra-high purity linoleic acid (99% minimum verified by gas chromatography).
